{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = E-TOP_WL306n |wikipedia = |brand = E-TOP |model = WL306n |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = October 31, 2010 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/E-TOP_WL306n |sernum = |wlclass = N150 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = corded adapter |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = U6A-WL306N |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8191SU; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/25/2010 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Transmit Power
802.11n: 24 ±1dBm
802.11g: 24 ±1dBm
802.11b: 30 ±1dBm
Receive Sensitivity
11b: -85dBm
11g: -73dBm
11n: -68dBm
The FCC test report lists the following as identical models... *E-TOP WL306n, WL307n (conflicts with existing [[E-TOP WL307n]] entry and FCC ID) *Amigo WL306n, WL307n (same) *CNet CWL-9xx series, CWL-907 *SAPIDO AU-4612, AU-4622, AU-4632 "EPMBWU306NBXX1ET" is silkscreened on the PCB of the wireless module. [[Category:English Documentation]]
